entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RFC 9266: Channel Bindings for TLS 1.3 support #73118
  • [NativeAOT] Stress crash in ThreadStore::DetachCurrentThread #73116
  • Question: Is there any document about the dotnet dump/gcdump file specification #73107
  • Missing.Value corner-case behavior changes in .NET 7 #73106
  • AF: System.RuntimeType.CheckValue trying to reflection invoke method with equivalent types #73103
  • Reflection Invoke crashing on methods with ref void* arguments #73100
  • `[STAThread]` attribute is ignored when `Main` is asynchronous #73099
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Assert in Internal_Runtime_MethodTable__get_NonClonedNonArrayBaseType #73098
  • Http2Connection over async NamedPipe transport hangs when writing preface when Server is waiting for the client to Synchronize. #73097

Closed

  • Math error #73112
  • Keeping byref on stack gives InvalidProgramException #73102
  • UsePollingFileWatcher_UseActivePolling_HasChanged_SymbolicLink_TargetChanged failed due to access denied #72902

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove static readonly fields from X500NameEncoder #73115
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: have jit tail call stress avoid creating loops in some cases #73114
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove undefined behavior for address of null reference #73113
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [GC] Handle objects from frozen segments in GCHeap::IsEphemeral #73110
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add localloc empty stack verification #73109
    area-ILVerification, community-contribution
  • `runtime-wasm-perf`: add support for running against forks, and branches #73105
    arch-wasm, tenet-performance, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Enable more libraries tests #73104
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Implement test checking whether CET is active #71509
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add retry to symlink test #73042
    area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • Move System.ValueType.s_seed into System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers #73080
    community-contribution
  • Annotate System.Linq.Queryable with RDC #72899
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Allocate string literals on frozen segments #49576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Bring back live host change #73095
  • Fixed a WKS specific issue by not clobbering the heap_segment_saved_allocated #72923
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update to use Mariner 2.0 as the build image #70111
    area-Infrastructure
  • Implement new API GetEnumValuesAsUnderlyingType #73057
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, CoreClr
  • JIT: one-sided inference from unrelated predicates #72979
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1913649 #73091
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Trying to add support for building WBT with multiple runtime packs #72815
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Introduce a default synchronization context for wasm #72652
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Tar: restore directory permissions while extracting. #72078
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] fix logging in subtle crypto #73073
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Collect crash dumps for aborting on Unix #73037
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono] Skip .mibc profile methods when not found #73066
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix assert in NativeAOT when handling data flow on compiler generated… #73085
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Assertion prop instrumentation #73035
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
